# cofide_connect_role_binding (Data Source)

Provides information about a role binding resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `group` (Attributes) The group principal for the role binding. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--group))
- `resource` (Attributes) The resource for the role binding. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--resource))
- `role_id` (String) The ID of the role.
- `user` (Attributes) The user principal for the role binding. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--user))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the role binding.

<a id="nestedatt--group"></a>
### Nested Schema for `group`

Required:

- `claim_value` (String) The claim value of the group.


<a id="nestedatt--resource"></a>
### Nested Schema for `resource`

Required:

- `id` (String) The ID of the resource.
- `type` (String) The type of the resource.


<a id="nestedatt--user"></a>
### Nested Schema for `user`

Required:

- `subject` (String) The subject of the user.
